join.text: If you want to join our team, take a part in the development and implementation of new technologies and find the embodiment of your ideas in metal, check out the open vacancies or send your resume to our email!

feedback.feedback_text: To receive more detailed information from our specialists, fill out the feedback form. If you are registered on our website, you can also fill out questionnaires and specifications of the required equipment in the User account.
feedback.callin_text: If you need environmentally friendly systems, want to reduce emissions, energy  and resource consumption, are planning to construct new facilities or to upgrade existing ones...
